member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.MongoDb.ConfigurationResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. If source files should be decompressed with GZip.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One or more file search patterns to read MongoDB export (mongoexport) JSON from.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Name of the documents collection.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Connection string including database name (example: "mongodb://localhost/database").

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.MongoDb.ConfigurationResources.OnlineSource_Projection
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Document that defines fields to include or exclude (example: {"state": true, "city": true} or {"state":1, "city":1}).

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.MongoDb.ConfigurationResources.OnlineSource_ProjectionFile

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Path to the file containing query document.
